Title: Create Agreement
Description: Use   agreements   to form mutual benefits for completing work which may otherwise not get accomplished.

Title: Job
Description: Describe the job that is needed, in as much detail as you can.

Title: Provisions
Description: Describe any mutual benefits to this agreement that come with the job implementation process as commitment happens.

Title: Considerations
Description: Add things to consider regarding this agreement, that the job may entail from time to time, which may get overlooked but are important to keep in mind.

Title: Create Article
Description: Use   articles   for time-sensitive content like news, press releases or blog posts.

Title: Avatar
Description: Set an avatar or theme for your post.

Title: Entry
Description: What is your article about?

Title: Create Audio
Description: Use   audio files   to hear amazing sounds.

Title: Add, Browse or Import Audio
Description: Create a playlist of audio files.

Title: Contents
Description: Describe the content of what people will hear in these audio files.

Title: Create Basic Page
Description: Use   basic pages   for your static content, such as an 'About us' page.

Title: Create Biography
Description: Use   biographies   to introduce yourself to the community.

Title: Introduction
Description: Discuss your personal biography in detail.

Title: Impressions
Description: Describe your community impressions, in ways that your feedback can be used at any time to implement improvements. We are here to help you out, if you need it.

Title: Create Category
Description: Use categories to list content into links of relativity.

Title: Create Concern
Description: Use   concerns   to voice care for projects of passion, that volunteer contributors like yourself appreciate.

Title: Concern
Description: Describe your passion in regards to an actively ongoing project accepting volunteer contributions, including your own.

Title: Issues
Description: Describe the work you have done to further the goal of this volunteer project, that you are concerned for.

Title: Care
Description: Describe the type of care that is regularly needed or sought for, in order to stabilize and grow this project of passion further.

Title: Contribute
Description: Add details for any position open to new volunteers, concerning any assistance that is needed with this project.

Title: Project
Description: Add recruitment information to help this project gain new volunteer contributors.

Title: Create Debate
Description: Use   debates   to have civil arguments with people about opposing views, while finding things in common that can make improvements to ideas, so that change can be implemented for the better.

Title: Argument
Description: Describe an attachment to purpose that you feel passionate about, enough to have a civil argument on, while keeping an open mind for opposition.

Title: Debate
Description: Describe what you are, and are not willing to address as talking points for this civil argument.

Title: Aftermath
Description: Describe how this debate is going, by periodically updating your point of view, as it, you and others exchange perspectives around this civil argument.

Title: Create Discussion
Description: Use   discussions   to gather initial feedback, on ideas generated by community interest.

Title: Discuss
Description: Describe in detail any idea that comes to mind, in relation to this topic of conversation.

Title: Experience
Description: Describe feedback, knowledge or insight that you intend to discover, while sharing your own thoughts and experiences relevant to this topic of conversation with other people.

Title: Create Document
Description: Use   documents   to read amazing things.

Title: Add, Upload Or Import Documents
Description: Create a folder of document files.

Title: Overview
Description: Describe what people will read when opening these documents.

Title: Create Embed
Description: Use   file embeds   to remotely display media from other sources across the web.

Title: Add Embed Code Or A Source URL To One Or More Files
Description: Create a playlist of remote media files. Please note that we have no control over when and or if media embeds will no longer remain online.

Title: Featuring
Description: Describe what people will be able to enjoy when viewing these file embeds. We will do our best to cache media in the event the embed source fails to load.

Title: Create Event
Description: Use   events   to organize, plan and orchestrate real moments of timeless continuity.

Title: Event
Description: Add relevant information about this event.

Title: Live
Description: Select the date and time, when this event begins and ends.

Title: Plan
Description: Describe what will happen during the event, as a schedule of things to do.

Title: Attendance
Description: Provide location, connection and contact information for any interested people that want to attend this event.

Title: Requirements
Description: Add any necessary expectations of commitment that might be needed or asked for, by all attendees of this event.

Title: Obligations
Description: Add some things to do, like enticing incentives or extra special contributions that attendees can look forward to while they are gathered together, in order to further the cause, purpose and reason for going to this event.

Title: Vision
Description: Describe your experience at an event like this, to others who may not know what to expect.

Title: Role
Description: Describe what role you play at this event, and the other roles available for different attendees to fulfill if applicable.

Title: Outlook
Description: For the uninitiated, describe what kind of impact an event like this has on the wider community, and how important it is to those who participate.

Title: Create File
Description: Use   file attachments   to display archives of importance that can be saved to your device.

Title: Add, Upload Or Import Files
Description: Create a folder of files.

Title: Contents
Description: Describe what these attached files contain.

Title: Create Game
Description: Use   games   to interactively engage community contributors with creative trivia.

Title: Rules
Description: Describe the game in detail, and include any rules players have to follow to score a win.

Title: Scores
Description: Periodically update the score as the game gets popular, attracting more players.

Title: Create Gift
Description: Use gifts to give something to or provide a complementary service for helping out someone or a specific cause in need.

Title: Gift
Description: Explain what you are gifting in as much detail as you can.

Title: Reclamation
Description: Describe who this gift is for, in the context of it going towards a person, cause or applicable donation.

Title: Explanation
Description: Explain why are you gifting this item to this recipient?

Title: Recipient
Description: Describe how this person or cause can claim this gift for themselves.

Title: Create Goal
Description: Use   goals   to implement change, in order to set yourself and or others up for success later on.

Title: Goal
Description: Describe the change you will commit to, and the focus you need to plan for, in order to help you achieve the success you want to make happen.

Title: Progress
Description: Add your progress you have made along the way, until your goal is fully implemented.

Title: Challenges
Description: Describe the challenges you are facing, and your plan to overcome each one. It is okay to collect feedback, and ask for help if you need to. No goal is met by one person alone.

Title: Create Group
Description: Use   groups   to share lists of content that relate to a particular topic of interest for greater analysis.

Title: Info
Description: Describe the content and purpose of this group.

Title: People
Description: Add links to the profiles of people in our community including yourself, who have contributed content relating to the purpose of this group.

Title: Posts
Description: Add links to other posts or create your own in our community, that relates to the purpose of this group.

Title: Replies
Description: Add links to replies made on posts in our community, including your own, that relate to the purpose of this group.

Title: Media
Description: Post directly or add links to media in our community, including your own, that relates to the purpose of this group.

Title: Files
Description: Attach directly or add links to files in our community, that relates to the purpose of this group.

Title: Topics
Description: Add links to other content categories in our community, that relate to the purpose of this group.

Title: Links
Description: Add links to content stored anywhere on the web, including in our community, that relate to the purpose of this group.

Title: Create Guide
Description: Use   guides   to create course materials.

Title: Section
Description: Add as many sections to your guide as is required, for the material to be presented properly.

Title: Create Idea
Description: Use   ideas   to organize your thoughts into plans of action, intent and focus.

Title: Idea
Description: Describe the idea you have come up with, as it relates to something obtainable through your own efforts, research or commitment to purpose.

Title: Evolution
Description: To the best of your ability, provide in detail the steps you believe to be required, in order to shape this idea into reality as you see it unfolding.

Title: Accommodation
Description: Describe the difficulty in getting this idea to market, if you were to do so alone.

Title: Value
Description: If your idea has been implemented, add the most appropriate (preferably numeric based) values that best represents its purpose in action.

Title: Purpose
Description: As need grows into demand, describe the meaning of the values provided above, whereby this idea holds true to purpose the most, throughout its implementation if applicable.

Title: Create Interest
Description: Use   interests   to assign lifestyle and culture, to hobbies and projects which appeal to you.

Title: Interest
Description: Describe a missing part of your life that you want to reclaim, through people, places and things.

Title: Seeking
Description: Describe the most relevant aspects of your interest that can best help you discover a match to what you are searching for, in correlation with a person, place or thing.

Title: Attraction
Description: Describe what attracts you to this interest in the context of a person, place or thing, including ideas that you are aware of.

Title: Detraction
Description: Describe what detracts you from this interest in the context of a person, place or thing, including ideas that you are aware of.

Title: Progression
Description: How much are you involved in doing something about obtaining your desires as they relate to this interest, in the context of a person, place or thing.

Title: Create Journal
Description: Use   journals   to document your life experience.

Title: Entries
Description: You can add as many entries as you like to your journal.

Title: Create Memory
Description: Use   memories   to display stories of great importance, revealing the events contained within.

Title: Memory
Description: Describe the story that unfolded, which made this memory so special to you.

Title: Reference
Description: Add the date, time and place, where this memory came into being.

Title: Replication
Description: Say if there is anything you would, could or should have changed to recreate a different result, than the one that already happened.

Title: Create Mood
Description: Use   moods   to share how you feel, alongside the cause for your emotion.

Title: Mood
Description: Add your emotions based around people, places, things or ideas, and share why you feel that way for each one.

Title: Create Note
Description: Use   notes   to create a task list of things in motion.

Title: Note
Description: Add a note, task list, reminder, or emotion, as a contemporary state of focus to address sometime soon.

Format: This category creates an overview of the type of engagement expected by the relevant content type, as well as how relevant the information is within each field group belonging to it.
Identity: This definition establishes the type of example field this part of the content type is positioned at.
Title: This is the title of the content type or field group, created based off of a Drupal site structure.
Description: Contains a general description of the content type or field group listed.
